EmailTemplate.name: Quotes Dual Application

EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We are working on your quote!
Case Number:
Please Note: The part(s) you have requested is a dual application part (used on both commercial and military applications).
As this is a Commercial Airline quote, please confirm Commercial usage by providing the following information:
• Aircraft Type • Engine Type • Specific End User
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
